description: Allows the user to record or display one or more sample test results for a specified sample group.
intent: Capture and record sample test results, including numeric and string values, for tests associated with a sample group.

inputs.SampleGroupID: Identifier of the sample group whose tests are being recorded

outputs.SampleResultValue: Numeric sample result value as a recipe variable
outputs.SampleResultString: Sample result value as a string recipe variable
outputs.FinalResultValue: Final pass/fail result as a recipe variable (0=fail, 1=pass, 2=N/A)

postconditions: Sample test results are committed and available for downstream processing
side_effects: May call the Exception phase to record an exception related to the sample
example_usage: Operator selects a test from the Sample Group grid, enters a result value and UOM (or uses manual entry), saves the entry, optionally records exceptions, and clicks Finish to commit the results.
